short_definition: Allows a governmental agency as judgment creditor to set-off a judgment against a debtor's tax refund to satisfy the outstanding judgment or other debt.
long_definition_html: Allows a governmental agency as judgment creditor to set-off a judgment against a debtor's tax refund to satisfy the outstanding judgment or other debt.
long_definition_markdown: Allows a governmental agency as judgment creditor to set-off a judgment against a debtor's tax refund to satisfy the outstanding judgment or other debt.
long_definition_text: Allows a governmental agency as judgment creditor to set-off a judgment against a debtor's tax refund to satisfy the outstanding judgment or other debt.
